t: Chewy (company) - Wikipedia
s: 4 days ago - Chewy, Inc. is an American online retailer of pet food and other pet-related products based in Plantation, Florida. Chewy went public in 2019 with the ticker symbol CHWY on the New York Stock Exchange. Chewy was founded with the name "Mr. Chewy" in June 2011 by Ryan Cohen and Michael Day.
